title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: It"s a difficult undertaking for someone of my generation to watch a film like CITIZEN KANE .

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: Not because it"s " too old " or " too boring " ,

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: but because it has been hailed -- almost universally -- as the single best motion picture ever made .

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: And while the anticipation of seeing a film with such overwhelming acclaim may be quite exhilarating , actually watching it is ultimately an intimidating and somewhat disappointing experience .

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: This isn"t to say that I thought CITIZEN KANE was a bad film ; in fact , I thought everything about it was downright brilliant .

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: From the enchanting performances right down to the meticulously planned camera movements and clever lighting tricks , there isn"t a single element of CITIZEN KANE that isn"t a stunning achievement in all areas of filmmaking .

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: CITIZEN KANE"s storyline is deceptively simple .

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: Even though the plot unfolds by jumping in and out of nonlinear flashbacks , it is surprisingly easy to keep track of .

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: The straightforwardness and relatively fast pace of the story are what make it seem intimidating .

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: Because everything moves smoothly along without any standstill , it feels like we are being fooled - like there is something much greater that we just can"t seem to grasp .

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: As a first - time viewer , I knew from its reputation that there must be * something * that separates this movie from all the others ; something buried within its simple plotline that everybody else has seen , but that I just could not seem to get a handle on .

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: And then , during those final frames , that something was revealed ,

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: and it all began to make sense .

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: To me , it was these moments of confusion and uncertainty followed by a sense of enlightenment and appreciation that made watching CITIZEN KANE such a meaningful experience .

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: But no matter how great of a movie CITIZEN KANE really is , it can never live up to one"s expectations .

title: CITIZEN KANE may let some people down, but it's still worth seeing.
review: Although I do feel that it is deserving of its acclamation , the constant exposure to its six decades worth of hype and praise will invariably set most modern viewers " standards at a height that is virtually unreachable -- even if it really * is * the best movie of all time .

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: For the most part , I found D. W. Griffith"s THE BIRTH OF A NATION to be an amazing picture .

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: Even by the strict standards of Hollywood epics today , almost everything about this film was truly remarkable - especially when considering all of the technological limitations of the time .

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: It"s hard to believe that this was the first feature - length motion picture ever made , because Griffith really has the style down to a tee .

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: It seems like learning how to shoot and edit such a long , well - flowing story would be a skill that would take several films to master , but it looks as if Griffith virtually perfected the craft on his very first try .

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: Despite BIRTH"s long running time , the film rolls swiftly by without missing a beat .

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: The plot was surprisingly complex , beginning with a touching portrait of the friendship of two very different families ,

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: and soon branching off into several thematic subplots involving romance , war , despair , bigotry , and honor .

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: Given the intricacy of the story , I was impressed at how clearly and concisely it played out , especially after reminding myself that film has never been used to tell such a grand story before .

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: All praise aside , however , there were some areas of THE BIRTH OF A NATION that I found to be utterly appalling .

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: Namely , the heroic depiction of the Ku Klux Klan and the portrayal of blacks as vicious , easily led savages made my stomach turn .

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: The disclaimer at the beginning of the picture claims that Griffith"s intent was not to be racist , but merely historically accurate .

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: Needless to say , this is wrong on both counts : not only is THE BIRTH OF A NATION a disgustingly and overtly racist picture through and through ,

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: but a great deal of the so - called facts regarding the Civil War are either grossly skewed in favor of the Griffith"s conservative Southern mentality , or they are just plain made up .

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: Though this movie is most definitely a groundbreaking achievement in film - making , it most certainly isn"t a likable one .

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: To me , watching THE BIRTH OF A NATION was a worthwhile experience for historical purposes ,

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: and it really is easy to appreciate the tremendous effort that went into making it .

title: Easy to appreciate; hard to sit through.
review: But even so , I found it difficult to actually enjoy such a blatantly racially prejudiced movie .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: Ridley Scott"s ALIEN is an immensely terrifying film .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: But the terror that it instills within the audience is of a kind that is sadly unknown to most viewers today .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: These days , what passes as " horror " is a mishmash of hyperactive editing , cheap scares , bad rock music , and explicit death scenes .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: ALIEN is the antithesis of all that .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: ALIEN is a classic exercise in substance over style .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: Granted , it * is * a remarkably stylish film .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: It"s hard not to notice the flashy visuals , the exhaustingly intricate production design , and the terrifying creature effects .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: But what"s unique about ALIEN is that it never actually depends on any these elements to scare the viewer .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: It"s already a frightening movie at its core ; it just uses these elements to enhance the scares and add more believability to the story .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: Whereas most other big - budgeted horror titles rely solely on their special effects and lavish production values to frighten the viewer , ALIEN doesn"t have to -- its enthralling storyline , crafty camera - work , and masterful direction are effective enough on their own .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: What makes the horror of ALIEN so successful is that it sets up a feeling of anxiety and dread in the very beginning ,

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: and continues to slowly and gradually pile on the tension until the explosive climax .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: There are long , lingering shots where nothing seems to happen and characters don"t communicate with one another -- yet , the amount of tension in these scenes is unbearable .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: You * know * something just isn"t right .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: and makes its way aboard the ship .

review: and yet , oddly , you never see it coming .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: But there are a handful of areas that appear dated or otherwise out of place .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws
review: In most of the SFX - intensive sequences , the effects are carried out with striking realism , even by today"s standards .

title: ALIEN is undeniably terrifying, but still suffers from a few flaws

review: but were those prolonged Sigourney Weaver underwear shots really necessary ? Still , despite these minor gripes , I still consider ALIEN to be among the greatest and most well - made sci - fi / horror films I have ever experienced -- not to mention one of the scariest !

title: A thoughtful and stylish film, although deeply troubling.
review: This sort of ` neo - apocalyptic " setting is most likely what makes the film all the more alarming , since we as viewers are not accustomed to seeing such primitive acts of violence and barbarism atop a vibrant , modern - art backdrop .

title: A thoughtful and stylish film, although deeply troubling.
review: Even the graphically violent scenes are orchestrated in an upbeat and dance - like fashion , such as the scene wherein Alex and his droogs sexually assault a woman to the tune of " Singin " in the Rain " .

title: A thoughtful and stylish film, although deeply troubling.
review: The messages in A CLOCKWORK ORANGE are equally troubling .

title: A thoughtful and stylish film, although deeply troubling.
review: The film clearly stresses the importance of the human right to a free will ,

title: A thoughtful and stylish film, although deeply troubling.
review: but it also makes clear the problems that come along with such a right -- namely , that given the choice , many people will choose to be hateful and vicious , simply because they can be .

title: A thoughtful and stylish film, although deeply troubling.
review: A CLOCKWORK ORANGE also seems to suggest that there is no hope for dangerous individuals such as Alex ; that those who lack a conscience now will lack a conscience forever , regardless of what happens to them -- a troubling message indeed .

title: A thoughtful and stylish film, although deeply troubling.
review: Though much of A CLOCKWORK ORANGE is overtly shocking , it is still a relatively humble film .

title: A thoughtful and stylish film, although deeply troubling.
review: It is evident that Kubrick had a lot to say with this movie ,

title: A thoughtful and stylish film, although deeply troubling.
review: but rather than deliberately blurt his ideas at the viewer to get his point across , he wisely chose to implement the tiniest of subtleties in order to convey his messages .

title: A thoughtful and stylish film, although deeply troubling.
review: This is what makes A CLOCKWORK ORANGE stay fresh and interesting , even with repeat viewings .

title: A thoughtful and stylish film, although deeply troubling.
review: It is one of those films where no matter how many times one sees it , he will always pick up on something new .

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: HALLOWEEN , the infamous stalk " n slash flick about an escaped lunatic bent on brutally murdering random teenagers , has often been hailed as the " scariest movie of all time " .

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: It has been compared to ( and sometimes even held above ) PSYCHO , THE EXORCIST , and THE TEXAS CHAINSAW MASSACRE .

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: It was , until recently , the most successful , most profitable independent movie in cinema history .

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: It helped launch the careers of several young , struggling actors and filmmakers .

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: And as of 2002 , it has spawned seven big - budget sequels .

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: Okay , so we"ve established the fact that John Carpenter"s HALLOWEEN has received a lot of attention and critical acclaim .

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: But honestly , is it really deserving of all of this praise ? Was it really worth all the hype surrounding it ? As a devout fan of not only horror movies , but of the art of filmmaking in general , I"m going to have to say no .

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: I strongly feel that HALLOWEEN , although stylish , horrifying , and generally well - made , should not be ranked among such classics as PSYCHO , T. C. M. , or ROSEMARY"S BABY .

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: These films were far ahead of their time

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: and broke new ground .

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: HALLOWEEN , despite singlehandedly popularizing the slasher subgenre , was really nothing new , even for 1978 .

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: Why didn"t films like A BAY OF BLOOD ( 1971 ) , I DISMEMBER MAMA ( 1974 ) , ALICE SWEET ALICE ( 1976 ) , or SUSPIRIA ( 1977 ) get this much credit ? They all had a formula similar to that of HALLOWEEN"s ,

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: and in many ways , they were much better * ...

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: And they were made just a few years before ! Even in Italy , birthplace of some of horror"s most talented filmmakers ( Dario Argento , Mario Bava , Ruggero Deodato , Lucio Fulci , etc .

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: ) , HALLOWEEN is still considered a cult classic ! You"d think that a country that has been responsible for some of the most horrifying motion pictures ever made would"ve seen the fad for what it was ,

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: and not have given in .

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: But I suppose trends like these are often international , especially when they originate from a nation as influential as the United States .

title: It's good, but is it really THAT good?
review: Again , keep in mind that I"m not trying to say that HALLOWEEN is a bad movie ; only that it has been done many times before 1978 - -and better .

review: * This particular comment does not apply to " I DISMEMBER MAMA " , which --ahem-- is not really what I"d consider a " good movie " .

movie_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
title: A breathtakingly beautiful, utterly perfect film
review: Meanwhile , Aragorn , Legolas , and Gimli all venture to the Cursed Mountains to seek assistance from the lost souls who forever dwell there ; as the beautiful elfin queen Arwen is torn between her father"s wishes of joining her people for eternal life and her own desire to sacrifice her immortality in order to be with Aragorn .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: The premise of CUBE is an interesting , highly original one : six complete strangers awaken in a cubical maze / prison with absolutely no recollection of how they got there .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: Each of the characters has his or her own unique talent , which helps the party in their quest to escape , avoid the maze"s deadly traps , and find answers as to why they were captured and imprisoned .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: It sounds awesome , and the film"s trailer is certainly intriguing , but you may be disappointed .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: CUBE"s major fault is the overdone , unbelievable character development .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: Everyone in this movie seems to have bipolar disorder , as they all turn from friendly to hostile ( or , in one particular case , downright evil ) , then back again without question .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: Even for a situation this serious , there"s far too many unrealistic emotional loops for the movie"s span of 1 - 2 days .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: Also , why doesn"t anybody complain about being hungry or thirsty ? Another area where the film falls flat has to do with its inconsistencies involving mathematics .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: CUBE relies heavily on math by assigning numbers to each of the rooms , which supposedly represent their coordinates on a three - dimensional grid .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: Leaven , this math - whiz character ( who does virtually all of the work in the movie ) , can quickly and easily decipher their position , a process which is theoretically a long , draining , and frustrating one .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: Sure , she may be a math whiz ,

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: but then why did she have such a hard time determining if three - digit numbers were prime back towards the beginning of the film ? She concentrates for several seconds on numbers that are very obviously not prime , such as even numbers and numbers that are multiples of five .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: Many people who have absolutely no mathematical talent whatsoever ( take me , for example ) are able remember these sixth - grade rules .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: Later on in the movie , she dismisses certain complex math problems as being impossible to figure out mentally due to the numbers being astronomical .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: Mind you , these are the exact same types of problems that she had no trouble solving earlier .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: Another gripe I had with CUBE is that it can"t make up its mind whether it wants to be realistic or surreal .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: It"s okay to blend the two to a certain degree ,

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: but this movie fails by resorting to an unsatisfying middle ground .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: If the movie lived up to its ideal surrealistic potential , then it would have been far more existential and reminiscent of the classic surrealist play NO EXIT than of some nameless suspense / thriller action flick .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: CUBE would have been so much better off not trying to give a concrete explanation about the labyrinth .

title: Great concept is muddled by too many glaring flaws
review: The character"s original thoughts and assumptions were much more exciting and thought - provoking than the dull , unsatisfying answers given by Worth , the character who , believe it or not , was contracted to draw blueprints for the cube"s outer shell .

review: Still , CUBE is not a terrible movie .

review: At times it"s exciting , it"s unnerving , and it"s fascinating .

review: And visually , its a masterpiece .
